Detailed Description

Video subsystem main class.

The main unit of processing is a Plane. Each application can have multiple 'stages' or 'scenarios', and these are composed by multiple planes of animation. Each plane possess multiple GfxObj (graphical objects) which are rendered in sequence and blitted in their container planes before the planes can be merged together and form an animation frame.

See also:
Plane

void Video::Finalize (  )

void Video::Prepare ( const char *  stage )

Prepare one stage for rendering.

Each stage is stored in a script file which will be rendered by the video engine. This function reads this file and prepare the engine for rendering it to the screen.

Parameters:
stageFile name of the stage script as c-string.
